tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Fritz & Paul Kalkbrenner - Sky and Sand (Original Mix)

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Also erst﻿ X nen danke an den Paul den Produzenten, der alte HouseMeister : )
Really Enjoy this song everytime!! :-) If you like trying out new stuff, look for "Norwood & Hills - Im Fang Der Nebelschwaden", they are good﻿ friends of mine and I really like their music :-)
wunderschöne Seite.﻿ alle pls mal drauf gehen und liken! ;)) --> facebook: Wo sind deine Flügel? Du bist doch ein Engel
Sweden and Germany has the best producers in the whole world! Just freaking epic <3 alla vi som älskar Sverige ger tummen upp !﻿ <3
i love this shit määän﻿ for real
i love House music﻿ so much <3
Königskinder - I´m waiting (One Day/Reckoning Song Wankelmut Remix Style)﻿

äääääääähm
hallo? -.-
das ist﻿ 90% dubstep und 10% house﻿ ihr noobs oO
Hello world* Are you a pokemon?!﻿
Haha no :P But this means that this goes to all people from﻿ the world ( to those with internet connection ) But I'd like to be a pokemon.. must be great to be one.. ;)
